main.name: Abdou-errahmane Bousseta
main.description: Full Stack Developer by Day, Learner by Night.
main.bio: My name is Abdou-errahmane, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'am a 2020 graduate of the Moroccan National Higher School for Computer Science of Rabat. I hold a degree in Web Engineering and Mobile Computing. I'm very passionate and motivated to fulfill my dream to become a FullStack JS Engineer And Web Developer. In my free time, I love to keep brushing up my skills and to work on open source projects.
main.contactmessage: I'm currently looking for a full time software engineering/fullstack developer job opportunity. If you have any job positions available or if you have any questions regarding my profile your are more than welcome to message me. Please feel free to email me anytime at, bousseta.tkm@gmail.com.
